title: First Angular app lesson 12 - Adding a form to your Angular app
contents:
mode_edit

第 12 課 Angular 應用程式 - 向 Angular 應用程式中新增表單link

First Angular app lesson 12 - Adding a form to your Angular applink

本課程示範瞭如何將用以收集使用者資料的表單新增到 Angular 應用程式。這節課從一個功能性的 Angular 應用程式開始，並展示瞭如何新增一個表單。

This tutorial lesson demonstrates how to add a form that collects user data to an Angular app. This lesson starts with a functional Angular app and shows how to add a form it.

表單收集的資料只會傳送到應用程式的服務，後者會將其寫入瀏覽器的控制檯。這節課不涉及使用 REST API 傳送和接收表單資料。

The data that the form collects is sent only to the app's service, which writes it to the browser's console. Using a REST API to send and receive the form's data is not covered in this lesson.

所需時間： 完成這節課預計需要 20 分鐘左右。

Time required: expect to spend about 20 minutes to complete this lesson.

開始之前link

Before you startlink

這節課以上一課的程式碼為起點，你可以：

This lesson starts with the code from the previous lesson, so you can:

  • 在整合開發環境（IDE）中使用你在第 11 課中建立的程式碼。

    Use the code that you created in Lesson 11 in your integrated development environment (IDE).

  • 從上一課的程式碼範例開始。選擇，以便

    Start with the code example from the previous lesson. Choose the from Lesson 11 where you can:

    • 使用 StackBlitz 中的線上例子，其中 StackBlitz 的介面就是你的 IDE。

      Use the live example in StackBlitz, where the StackBlitz interface is your IDE.

    • 使用下載範例並在你的 IDE 中開啟它。

      Use the download example and open it in your IDE.

如果你還沒看過簡介，請存取 Angular 課程簡介以確保你已具備完成這節課所需的一切知識。

If you haven't reviewed the introduction, visit the Introduction to Angular tutorial to make sure you have everything you need to complete this lesson.

如果你在這節課中遇到任何問題，可以檢視這節課的完整程式碼，參見。

If you have any trouble during this lesson, you can review the completed code for this lesson, in the for this lesson.

完成之後link

After you finishlink

  • 應用程式有一個表單，使用者可以在其中輸入要傳送給服務的資料。

    Your app has a form into which users can enter data that is sent to your app's service.

  • 該服務將表單中的資料寫入瀏覽器的控制檯。

    The service writes the data from the form to the browser's console.

課程步驟link

Lesson stepslink

在 IDE 中對應用程式程式碼執行下列步驟。

Perform these steps on the app code in your IDE.

第 1 步 - 添加發送表單資料的方法link

Step 1 - Add a method to send form datalink

此步驟會向服務中新增一個方法，該方法接收要傳送到資料目的地的表單資料。在此範例中，該方法將表單中的資料寫入瀏覽器的控制檯日誌。

This step adds a method to your app's service that receives the form data to send to the data's destination. In this example, the method writes the data from the form to the browser's console log.

在 IDE 的編輯窗格中：

In the Edit pane of your IDE:

  1. 在 src/app/housing.service.ts 的 HousingService 類中，將此方法貼上到類定義的底部。

    In src/app/housing.service.ts, inside the HousingService class, paste this method at the bottom of the class definition.

    submitApplication(firstName: string, lastName: string, email: string) { console.log(`Homes application received: firstName: ${firstName}, lastName: ${lastName}, email: ${email}.`); }

  2. 確保應用在建構時沒有錯誤。在繼續下一步之前更正所有錯誤。

    Confirm that the app builds without error. Correct any errors before you continue to the next step.

第 2 步 - 將表單功能新增到詳情頁面link

Step 2 - Add the form functions to the details pagelink

此步驟將程式碼新增到處理表單互動的詳情頁面。

This step adds the code to the details page that handles the form interactions.

在 IDE 的編輯窗格中，開啟 src/app/details/details.component.ts 檔案：

In the Edit pane of your IDE, in src/app/details/details.component.ts:

  1. 在檔案頂部的 import 陳述式之後，新增以下程式碼以匯入 Angular 表單類別。

    After the import statements at the top of the file, add the following code to import the Angular form classes.

    import { FormControl, FormGroup, ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms';

  2. 在 DetailsComponent 裝飾器的元資料中，使用以下程式碼更新 imports 屬性：

    In the DetailsComponent decorator metadata, update the imports property with the following code:

    imports: [ CommonModule, ReactiveFormsModule ],

  3. 在 DetailsComponent 類中的 constructor() 方法之前，新增以下程式碼以建立表單物件。

    In the DetailsComponent class, before the constructor() method, add the following code to create the form object.

    applyForm = new FormGroup({ firstName: new FormControl(''), lastName: new FormControl(''), email: new FormControl('') });

    在 Angular 中，FormGroup 和 FormControl 是能幫你構建出表單的型別。FormControl 型別可以提供預設值並塑造表單資料的形態。在此範例中，firstName 是一個 string，預設值為空字串。

    In Angular, FormGroup and FormControl are types that enable you to build forms. The FormControl type can provide a default value and shape the form data. In this example firstName is a string and the default value is empty string.

  4. 在 DetailsComponent 類中的 constructor() 方法之後，新增以下程式碼來處理 Apply now 的點選事件。

    In the DetailsComponent class, after the constructor() method, add the following code to handle the Apply now click.

    submitApplication() { this.housingService.submitApplication( this.applyForm.value.firstName ?? '', this.applyForm.value.lastName ?? '', this.applyForm.value.email ?? '' ); }

    此按鈕尚不存在 - 你將在下一步中新增它。在上面的程式碼中，FormControl 可能會返回 null。如果值為 null，此程式碼使用空值合併運算子 ?? 將其預設為空字串。

    This button does not exist yet - you will add it in the next step. In the above code, the FormControls may return null. This code uses the nullish coalescing operator to default to empty string if the value is null.

  5. 確保應用在建構時沒有錯誤。在繼續下一步之前更正所有錯誤。

    Confirm that the app builds without error. Correct any errors before you continue to the next step.

第 3 步 - 將表單的標記新增到詳情頁面link

Step 3 - Add the form's markup to the details pagelink

此步驟將標記新增到顯示表單的詳情頁面。

This step adds the markup to the details page that displays the form.

在 IDE 的編輯窗格中，開啟 src/app/details/details.component.ts 檔案：

In the Edit pane of your IDE, in src/app/details/details.component.ts:

  1. 在 DetailsComponent 裝飾器的元資料中，把 template 的 HTML 更新成如下程式碼，以新增表單的標記。

    In the DetailsComponent decorator metadata, update the template HTML to match the following code to add the form's markup.

    template: ` <article> <img class="listing-photo" [src]="housingLocation?.photo" alt="Exterior photo of {{housingLocation?.name}}"/> <section class="listing-description"> <h2 class="listing-heading">{{housingLocation?.name}}</h2> <p class="listing-location">{{housingLocation?.city}}, {{housingLocation?.state}}</p> </section> <section class="listing-features"> <h2 class="section-heading">About this housing location</h2> <ul> <li>Units available: {{housingLocation?.availableUnits}}</li> <li>Does this location have wifi: {{housingLocation?.wifi}}</li> <li>Does this location have laundry: {{housingLocation?.laundry}}</li> </ul> </section> <section class="listing-apply"> <h2 class="section-heading">Apply now to live here</h2> <form [formGroup]="applyForm" (submit)="submitApplication()"> <label for="first-name">First Name</label> <input id="first-name" type="text" formControlName="firstName"> <label for="last-name">Last Name</label> <input id="last-name" type="text" formControlName="lastName"> <label for="email">Email</label> <input id="email" type="email" formControlName="email"> <button type="submit" class="primary">Apply now</button> </form> </section> </article> `,

    該範本現在包含一個事件處理程式 (submit)="submitApplication()"。Angular 在事件名稱周圍使用圓括號語法來在範本程式碼中建立定義事件。等號右邊的程式碼是當觸發此事件時應執行的程式碼。你可以繫結到瀏覽器事件和自訂事件。

    The template now includes an event handler (submit)="submitApplication()". Angular uses parentheses syntax around the event name to create define events in the template code. The code on the right hand side of the equals sign is the code that should be executed when this event is triggered. You can bind to browser events and custom events.

  2. 確保應用在建構時沒有錯誤。在繼續下一步之前更正所有錯誤。

    Confirm that the app builds without error. Correct any errors before you continue to the next step.

第 4 步 - 測試應用的新表單link

Step 4 - Test your app's new formlink

此步驟會測試新表單，以檢視當表單資料提交到應用程式時，表單資料會出現在控制檯日誌中。

This step tests the new form to see that when the form data is submitted to the app, the form data appears in the console log.

  1. 在 IDE 的終端窗格中，執行 ng serve （如果它尚未執行）。

    In the Terminal pane of your IDE, run ng serve, if it isn't already running.

  2. 在你的瀏覽器中，透過 http://localhost:4200 開啟應用程式。

    In your browser, open your app at http://localhost:4200.

  3. 在應用程式中，右鍵單擊應用程式，然後從上下文選單中選擇 Inspect。

    In your app, right click in the app and from the context menu, choose Inspect.

  4. 在開發者工具視窗中，選擇控制檯選項卡。確保開發者工具視窗對後續步驟可見

    In the developer tools window, choose the Console tab. Make sure that the developer tools window is visible for the next steps

  5. 在應用程式中：

    In your app:

    1. 選擇房屋位置並單擊瞭解更多，以檢視有關房屋的詳情。

      Select a housing location and click Learn more, to see details about the house.

    2. 在房屋的詳情頁面中，滾動到底部以找到新表格。

      In the house's details page, scroll to the bottom to find the new form.

    3. 在表單的欄位中輸入資料 - 任何資料都可以。

      Enter data into the form's fields - any data is fine.

    4. 選擇立即應用以提交資料。

      Choose Apply now to submit the data.

  6. 在開發者工具視窗中，檢視日誌輸出以找到你的表單資料。

    In the developer tools window, review the log output to find your form data.

課程回顧link

Lesson reviewlink

在這節課中，你將應用更新為：

In this lesson, you updated your app to:

  • 使用 Angular 的表單功能新增表單

    add a form using Angular's forms feature

  • 使用事件處理程式將表單中捕獲的資料連線到表單

    connect the data captured in the form to a form using an event handler

如果你在學習這節課時遇到了任何問題，可以在檢視完整程式碼。

If you are having any trouble with this lesson, you can review the completed code for it in the .

下一步link

Next stepslink

  • 第 13 課 - 將搜尋功能新增到應用程式

    Lesson 13 - Add the search feature to your application
